summary: When Frankie Baldwin and Nate Deluca both have a claim to ownership of Sorrento Farm, they are forced to divide the vineyard right down the middle and work the fields alongside each other ... See full summary »
cast: Rachael Leigh Cook|Brendan Penny|Jill Teed|Jeremy Guilbaut|Laura Soltis|Tom Butler|Ali Liebert|Nathaniel Middleton|Marcus Rosner|Lucia Walters|Julian Christopher|John Emmet Tracy|Leslee Achorn|Malcolm Boddington
title: Otoño en los viñedos
